metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45417 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
AIDE before 0.17.4 allows local users to obtain root privileges via crafted file metadata (such as XFS extended attributes or tmpfs ACLs), because of a heap-based buffer overflow.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-45417` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

aide - 0.17.3-4ubuntu0.1
aide-common - 0.17.3-4ubuntu0.1
aide-dynamic - 0.17.3-4ubuntu0.1
aide-xen - 0.17.3-4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: aide package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.17.3-4ubuntu0.1').
